column2: Active, groomed, healthy-looking other than very large tumor on right side and smaller tumor on left side
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumors
Very large tumors on right and smaller on left side. Lungs/heart looked normal.  Skull was intact.
Two tumor chunks frozen, no cell line attempted
